name: The Bunny Hopper
description:
The Bunny Hopper is a 2d platformer with pixel art and a focus on simple top-down combat. It’s set in a dystopian fantasy world with many mutated monstrosities.  The player will have to fight their way through these monstrosities while racing against time. I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

W A S D - To Move

Space  - To Shoot

Alt+F4  - To Quit the game
